answers.answer: My first appointment they just asked me questions about family history or past medical records and that sort of thing and I think I got my blood drawn that time too. Then the second appointment I got my first ultrasound (:

I had mine on Monday and they asked me and my boyfriend a whole bunch of questions about our backgrounds and about our families for like diabetes.,  mental retardation and a bunch of stuff.they'll probably also check out your cervix .
Oh and the second appointment I also got a papsmear and other tests like that
Was that drs or obgyn. Bc I went to drs to confirm I was pregnant then they sent me to obgyn who today said that they were just confirming it for themselves?? Is it  just me or does that sound weird

question: My first obgyn appt is tomorrow morning, what should I expect? They said they're only doing a pee test to confirm but my dr already did that (twice lol)... the dr didn't tell me my due date or anything, just the pee test then I was off with a referral to the obgyn.
title: obgyn appointment
